mixed.name: Aberration
mixed.description: Creates fringes along the X axis of the input image, commonly colored orange, blue, green, or purple

mixed.name: Chroma Blur
mixed.description: Blurs the 'color' of the image but not the value/luminance of the image, similar to old footage

mixed.name: CRT Grid
mixed.description: Emulates the grid pattern of CRT monitors. This does not include other effects often seen in CRT footage

mixed.name: Dithered Quantize
mixed.description: Reduces the bit depth of the image with dithering to remove banding artifacts. Uses an 8x8 matrix

mixed.name: Grain
mixed.description: Used to emulate film grain. The grain pattern is both mixed and multiplied over the image

mixed.name: Halation
mixed.description: A colored blur/bloom effect applied to specific colors of the image, used to emulate film

mixed.name: Haze
mixed.description: A large scale blur applied to the input to imitate a hazy lens or filter

mixed.name: Linear Overlay
mixed.description: Similar to the overlay blend mode, but works with HDR inputs

mixed.name: Prebloom
mixed.description: Applies common operations that are sometimes required before effects like Bloom or Glare

mixed.name: Quantize
mixed.description: Reduces the bit depth of the image, with additional artistic controls over Blender's in-built Quantize

mixed.name: Radial Defocus
mixed.description: Emulates the effect of a detuned lens or an anamorphic lens

mixed.name: Scene Outline
mixed.description: Adds an outline to the scene using depth and normal information using Sobel edge detection

mixed.name: Sensor Fringe
mixed.description: Adds a colored purple blur effect that is similar to old/faulty CMOS sensor digital cameras

mixed.name: Vignette
mixed.description: Adds a vignette effect to the image, designed to emulate real cameras

unmixed.name: Anamorphic Bloom
unmixed.description: A bloom effect that is similar to glare seen in anamorphic lenses using 5-step box blur on the Y axis

unmixed.name: Anamorphic Ghost
unmixed.description: A ghosting effect along the Y axis that is seen in anamorphic lens flares

unmixed.name: Bloom
unmixed.description: A bloom effect seen in lenses of all kinds (even the human eye) using a 10-step gaussian blur

unmixed.name: Ghost
unmixed.description: An effect similar to different ghost elements seen in lens flares

unmixed.name: Glint
unmixed.description: A multi-directional streak effect seen in digital sensors

unmixed.name: Outline Mask
unmixed.description: Generates an outline mask using Sobel edge detection

unmixed.name: Radial Ghost
unmixed.description: A ghost effect that is specifically seen along the edges of a lens

unmixed.name: Streaks
unmixed.description: A multi-directional streak effect seen in digital sensors

color.name: Chroma
color.description: Alters the saturation/chroma of the image using a power function for smoother falloff with correction for saturation

color.name: Gamut Compress
color.description: Compresses the gamut of the image

color.name: Interpret ACEScg
color.description: Interprets the incoming input as if it was in ACEScg linear space

color.name: Interpret E-gamut
color.description: Interprets the incoming input as if it was in Filmlight E-gamut linear space

color.name: Primaries
color.description: Alter the primary RGB colors and remaps them to something else

color.name: TanH View Transform
color.description: Applied the TanH math function on all 3 channels, working as a psuedo view transform/compressor

batches.name: Anamorphic Flare
batches.description: Combines Anamorphic Bloom and Anamorphic Ghost together

batches.name: CRT Process
batches.description: An approximated emulation of CRT footage using nodes like CRT Grid and Chroma Blur

batches.name: Generic Comp
batches.description: A generic, pre-made combination of Bloom, Steaks, Sharpen, and Grain

batches.name: Lens
batches.description: A generic combination of various bloom, ghost, and lens distortion effects

batches.name: Tail-end
batches.description: A combination of Aberration, Halation, Sharpen, and Grain nodes

utilities.name: Dispersion
utilities.description: Adds a dispersion effect to the image, as seen in lenses

utilities.name: Image Add
utilities.description: Add operation that allows an RGB image to be a factor for the operation

utilities.name: Image Clamp
utilities.description: Clamps the maximum and minimum values for the input image

utilities.name: Per-pixel Random Noise
utilities.description: Per-pixel random noise based on the resolution of the input image

utilities.name: RGB to BW
utilities.description: Converts RGB images to BW using max(R,G,B) function

utilities.name: Scene Mixer
utilities.description: Mix all the different render passes into one combined pass with expanded controls

utilities.name: Screen UV
utilities.description: Adds the screen UV texture of the current Scene. Z channel is constant 1

utilities.name: Smart Denoiser
utilities.description: Denoises the image and mixes it with the noisy image using a noise threshold. This preserves the quality of non-noisy parts of the image due to the denoiser

utilities.name: Threshold
utilities.description: Masks the image based on value

utilities.name: Uniform Distortion
utilities.description: Lens distortion effect that does not stretch with aspect ratio; akin to distortion seen in real lenses

utilities.name: Unsharp Mask
utilities.description: Usually used for sharpening effects or edge detection

dev.name: Absolute
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Bloom 5-step Box Blur
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Bloom 10-step Blur
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Compressed Distance
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Dot Product
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Global Colorspace Conversion
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Global Drivers
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Global Textures
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Grain Mosaic
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Mosaic 9-way Mix
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Mosaic Clamp
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.

dev.name: Uniform Radial Distortion
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes.
